page.title: 04EDUCATION PAGE 4
page.content: IN OUR AREA THERE ARE 3 PRIMARY SCHOOLS,ARDGLASS P.S.,ST.JOSEPH'S P.S.,ST.NICHOLAS' P.S. AND ONE NURSERY SCHOOL.ARDGLASS P.S. IS A CONTROLLED PRIMARY SCHOOL SITUATED ON THE DOWNPATRICK RD. IN ARDGLASS.THERE ARE 90 PUPILS AND 4 TEACHERS IN IT.HALF OF THEM COME FROM THE R.A.F. STATION AT BISHOPSCOURT AND THE REST ARE LOCAL CHILDREN.ST.NICHOLAS P.S. IS A VOLUNTARY PRIMARY SCHOOL ON THE DOWNPATRICK RD. IN ARDGLASS.IT ONCE WAS A SECONDARY SCHOOL FORMERLY CALLED ST.ANNE'S.IT HAS 180 PUPILS AND 8 TEACHERS.ST.JOSEPH'S P.S. IS A VOLUNTARY PRIMARY SCHOOL IN MAIN ST. IN KILLOUGH.IT IS A VERY MODERN BUILDING AND HAS 100 PUPILS AND 4 TEACHERS.THE NURSERY SCHOOL IN ARDGLASS IS PRIVATELY RUN AND IS HELD IN THE MASONIC HALL.IT HAS 32 PRE-SCHOOL CHILDREN.
